titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on preparations based on ethanediamide, N-(2-ethoxyphenyl)-N'-(4-isodecylphenyl)-).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/19/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on preparations based on ethanediamide, N-(2-ethoxyphenyl)-N'-(4-isodecylphenyl)-).
